Basic List

List groups are a flexible and powerful component for displaying a series of content. Modify and extend them to support just about any content within. Read bootstrap documentaion for more details.

  • Cras justo odio
  • Dapibus ac facilisis in
  • Morbi leo risus
  • Porta ac consectetur ac
  • Vestibulum at eros

Links and Buttons

Use <a>s or <button>s to create actionable list group items with hover, disabled, and active states by adding .list-group-item-action. Read bootstrap documentaion for more details.

Cras justo odio Dapibus ac facilisis in Morbi leo risus Porta ac consectetur ac Vestibulum at eros

Contextual Classes List

Use contextual classes to style list items with a stateful background and color. Read bootstrap documentaion for more details.

  • This is a secondary list group item
  • This is a success list group item
  • This is a danger list group item
  • This is a warning list group item
  • This is a info list group item

With Badges

Add badges to any list group item to show unread counts, activity, and more. Read bootstrap documentaion for more details.

  • Cras justo odio 14
  • Dapibus ac facilisis in 2
  • Morbi leo risus 24
  • Porta ac consectetur ac 6
  • Vestibulum at eros 6

Desable List

Add .disabled to a .list-group-item to make it appear disabled. Read bootstrap documentaion for more details.

  • Cras justo odio
  • Dapibus ac facilisis in
  • Morbi leo risus
  • Porta ac consectetur ac
  • Vestibulum at eros

Custom Content

Add nearly any HTML within, even for linked list groups like the one below, with the help of flexbox utilities. Read bootstrap documentaion for more details.

List group item heading
3 days ago

Donec id elit non mi porta.
